outputs.output_descr: This project will enable activities for the preparation of Nigeria's Second National Communication to the United Nations Framework Convention on Climate Change (UNFCCC) which includes Climate Change mitigation support  the Ministry of Environment

project_descr: Enabling activities for Nigeria's Second National Communication to the UNFCCC with the objective of identifying areas in previous document for strengthening, and to initiate studies and capacity development activities in areas not previously covered.
project_title: Second Communication to Climate Change Convention
